prodNameC: 羅氏原位雜交藍視野系列加強型鑑定組
prodNameE: Roche ISH iVIEW TM Blue Plus Detection Kit
ingredientsDesc: 1-10 ml dispenser ISH iVIEW Blue Plus Amp; contains mouse anti-rabbit antibody in phosphate buffered saline with protein stabilizer and preservative.
1-10 ml dispenser iVIEW Blue Plus Enhancer; contains an MgCl2 solution with preservative.
1-10 ml dispenser iVIEW Blue Plus BCIP; contains 5-bromo-4-chloro-3-indolyl phosphate in a Tris buffer.
1-10 ml dispenser iVIEW Blue Plus Streptavidin Alkaline Phosphatase; contains enzyme conjugate in Tris buffer with MgCl2 and ZnCl2.
1-10 ml dispenser iVIEW Blue Plus NBT; contains nitro blue tetrazolium in 1% dimethylformamide (DMF).
1-10 ml dispenser ISH iVIEW Blue Plus HybReady; contains prehybridization buffer with formamide.
1-10 ml dispenser ISH iVIEW Blue Plus anti-DNP; contains rabbit anti-DNP antibody in phosphate buffered saline with protein stabilizer and preservative.
1-10 ml dispenser iVIEW Blue Plus Biotinylated Ig; contains affinity purified goat anti-mouse IgG in phosphate buffered saline with protein stabilizer and preservative.
applicantName: 台灣羅氏醫療診斷設備股份有限公司
applicantAddr: 台北市中山區民權東路3段2號10樓
efficacy: 利用兔子抗DNA抗體當初級抗體，接著藉由間接生物素鏈黴卵白素(biotin-streptavidin)系統偵測被Ventana DNP標定的探針。
